column1: Figure 1: Long-term International migration, UK, year ending December 2008 to year ending December 2018
Source: Office for National statistics – Long-Term International Migration

1.         Confidence intervals are not available for net migration estimates prior to 2012 as revisions were made to data for 2001 to 2011 following the 2011 Census. This does not mean the revised estimates are more certain.

2.      Confidence intervals are not available for immigration and net migration estimates for the years ending September 2016, December 2016, March 2017 and June 2017 following revisions to the non-EU immigration for formal study. This does not mean the revised estimates are more certain.
